title: LC2 Style Petit Confort Armchair
body: The Mobelaris style of LC2 Style Petit Confort Armchair is one of the first modern furniture line to take a radical step in making the furniture frame dramatic and visible aspect of the design in 1929 for the Salon d Automne art exhibition in Paris. This inside out sofa is composed of a simple tubular stainless steel frame and leather-covered cushions, a modernist response to the traditional chair that still manage to stay strong even after more than nine decades. This LC2 Style Armchair style by Mobelaris is a spacious chair which creates an impressive style statement in any environment.
